Package models

Class MovieScreening

java.lang.Object
models.MovieScreening
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MovieScreening extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the MovieScreening object which is a session of a Movie
Since:
2022-11-7
Version:
1.0
Author:
Oliver Low
